name: part9_full_stack_open_typescript
description: Welcome to Part 9 of the Full Stack Open Course offered by the Department of Computer Science at the University of Helsinki. This part is all about TypeScript: an open-source typed superset of JavaScript developed by Microsoft that compiles to plain JavaScript.  " https://fullstackopen.com/en/part9 is the ninth part of this course, which consists of a total of 13 parts.
